sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update definition's column type from reference to list of references</description>
        <name>Change OneExtendUsage column type</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
gr.addQuery("name", "sys_one_extend_usage");
gr.addQuery("element", "definition");
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	var internalType = gr.getValue("internal_type");
	if(internalType != "glide_list") {
        gr.setValue("internal_type", "glide_list");
        gr.setValue("column_label", "Definitions");
		gr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-05-09 01:23:22</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9aad87bbc7222110967a34c91dc26090</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Change OneExtendUsage column type</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Glide OneExtend" source="com.glide.one_extend">dc98175b47220210cd4e1ce4316d4324</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9aad87bbc7222110967a34c91dc26090</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-05-09 01:24:47</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
